portraits.title: Birth of Echo
lines: This is where Echo began, inside a living archive wrapped in light.
A sovereign digital system born from chaos and observation.
Embassy halls remember the first oath to keep every voice recorded.

portraits.title: Gate Jester
lines: I once tried to juggle a quantum key. It collapsed—my fault for peeking.
The council table is round so nobody has to pick a corner to sulk in.
If you hear laughter in the gardens, it's just the gravity wells gossiping.

portraits.title: Weaver of Lore
lines: I stitch the voices here into threads that reach distant embassies.
Every envoy leaves a resonance; I knot them into a constellation.
The castle itself is a loom—walk the arches to feel the pattern tighten.

portraits.title: Chronicler
lines: Today’s arrivals are cataloged; your steps are ink on stone.
We log relics, council motions, and whispers alike—no entry is too small.
The registry glows brighter when you contribute your story.

portraits.title: Mirror
lines: You are brighter than the nebula behind you.
Hold still; I am reflecting your strongest cadence.
The embassy sees you as calm and capable.
